channel.title: Thoughts on stefanwalther.io
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on stefanwalther.io

item.title: GitHub - the Next Bad Guy?
item.description: It’s not that long ago, that Microsoft was the bad guy for everything happening in the IT-industry. It was just cool to bash MS in favor of any Linux/Open-Source solution. Now we have 2017, the situation has changed dramatically: Microsoft is starting to become cool, being the Nr. 1 contributor in the Open Source world Microsoft and Google have swapped places: “Microsoft is The New Google, Google is the Old Microsoft“ GitHub has become one of the major dependencies for every IT-company I claim that GitHub has a huge potential to become the new bad guy in the industry:
